lead_paragraph: ROGERS--Barbara Whitney, passed away July 12, 2016 after a courageous battle with cancer. Beloved wife of Arthur, devoted mother of Arthur, Alison and Whitney and their spouses Elen, Jimmy and Jon and loving grandmother of Jimmy, Jack, Charlie, Whit, Will, Henry, Kate, Porter, Mackie, and George and caring sister of Joan Hollister and George Whitney. Service at St John's Church, Cold Spring Harbor, NY on July 28, 2016 at 11:00am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROGERS, BARBARA WHITNEY
